  • checkHttpResponse

    public static boolean checkHttpResponse(org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse response)
    Checks for the following conditions:
  • HttpResponse is not-null
  • HttpResponse status is less than 300
  • Checks if the entity value within the HttpResponse is non-null


    • If the conditions are met, boolean 'True' is returned, else 'False'.

Parameters:
response -
Returns:
boolean
